tasks.label: git: commit and push
tasks.command: git add addons/tween_node/scripts/actions/set_value.gd addons/tween_node/scripts/internal/tween_node_warning_utils.gd addons/tween_node/scripts/internal/tween_node_preview_state_utils.gd addons/tween_node/scripts/internal/tween_node_runtime_seek_utils.gd addons/tween_node/tests/tween_node_test.gd && git commit -m "tween_node: support indexed property paths in SetValue" -m "- SetValue validates and applies property paths (set_indexed)" -m "- Preview/seek state capture uses property paths" -m "- Warn about missing 'default' target only when used" && git push
